title: Were there female Prophets in islam or Messengers & Prophets from the Jinn? - #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: your first question is are you asking about the existence of female prophets in Islam yes or no yes okay the answer is no there is no Prophets among the females in Islam since the time of Adam nor there are prophets or Messengers among the Jinn because Allah would not choose a prophet or a messenger except from the humans and this is the most authentic opinion among Scholars and Allah Knows Best
